snippet: Two early films from the British-Ghanian documentarian John Akomfrah are on view at the Maysles Cinema in Harlem, one eyeing black history, the other the future.
lead_paragraph: Two early films from the British-Ghanian documentarian John Akomfrah are on view at the Maysles Cinema in Harlem, one eyeing black history, the other the future.

headline.main: Two Early Films From John Akomfrah
headline.content_kicker: Movie Review | 'Seven Songs for Malcom X' and 'The Last Angel of History'
headline.seo: ‘Seven Songs for Malcolm X,’ ‘The Last Angel of History’ — Review
